org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.operations

Interface MetadataDeleter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumuloMetadataDeleter, CassandraMetadataDeleter, DynamoDBMetadataDeleter, FileSystemMetadataDeleter, HBaseMetadataDeleter, KuduMetadataDeleter, RedisMetadataDeleter, RocksDBMetadataDeleter

    public interface MetadataDeleter
extends AutoCloseable
    Provides an interface for deleting GeoWave metadata. A MetadataQuery is used to specify the metadata to be deleted. Delete queries may only be performed if the deleter is not closed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean delete(MetadataQuery query)
      Delete metadata from the DB.
      void flush()
      Flush the deleter, committing all pending changes.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        boolean delete(MetadataQuery query)
        Delete metadata from the DB. Preconditions:
        • The deleter is not closed
        Parameters:
        query - The query that specifies the metadata to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if an object matching the query was found and successfully deleted, false otherwise.

      • flush

        void flush()
        Flush the deleter, committing all pending changes. Note that the changes may already be committed - this method just establishes that they *must* be committed after the method returns. Preconditions:
        • The deleter is not closed
